high_descs: Turn to the right and face the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
Pick up the pencil next to the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pencil by the light of the lamp.

high_descs: Turn on the lamp on the table
Grab the pencil on the left
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the table, grab the pencil

high_descs: Turn to your right and face the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
Pick up the pencil to the left of the black mug.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp, pick up a pencil.
